Reviews.Title: “Not like a European NH”

Reviews.Content: reception desk foyer decor impression european style nh hotel isnt paperthin walls coughed modernising bottom unlucky 6th floor cleanliness european standards bathroom instance 6 7 morning wakeup calls none real apology breakfast passable nonchalant omelette guy elsewhere location fine feel fairly safe loud behaviour streets restaurant ethnic mexican food del excellent value restaurant capital city

Reviews.Title: “A good hotel for a short city stay.”
Reviews.Author: BobblenoseWarwicks
Reviews.Content: spent 3 nights beginning mexico elevators 8th floor comfortable maintenance issues promptly dealt staff met helpful buffet breakfast acceptable including mexican dishes selection breads pastries pancakes tropical fruits strange system cooking omelettes chef glass screen safety tho helped yourself fillings omelette dishes cough passed screen cooked restaurant size hotel tho usually managed table difficulty plenty restaurants dinner walking distance hotel zona rosa busy evenings perfectly safe
